casebody.data:
Elizabeth C. Wardwell, Appellant, v. The Mayor, &c., of New York, Respondents. Decided July 2, 1886. Appeal from judgment in favor of defendants, entered on verdict rendered by direction of *545court. Moore, Low & Sandford, for appellant. E. H. Lacombe, for respondents.

Before Sedgwick, Ch. J., Truax and O’Gorman, JJ.

Opinion by O’Gorman, J. Judgment and order affirmed, with costs.
